meanings.sent1: I will never forget your birthday.
meanings.sent3: The cat promised to never chase the mouse again.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like a flame that never flickered.
meanings.sent5: The sun never fails to rise in the east.

meanings.definition: Not at all; not in any degree.
meanings.sent1: I am never tired after playing outside.
meanings.sent2: He never listens to his mother's advice.
meanings.sent3: The clown's jokes were so bad that they never made anyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a light that never dimmed.
meanings.sent5: The river never stops flowing, just like time.

meanings.definition: Not under any condition; not in any circumstances.
meanings.sent1: I will never lie to you, no matter what.
meanings.sent2: They never go out without their umbrellas.
meanings.sent3: The magician promised to never reveal his secrets.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like a force that never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The old clock never stops ticking, reminding us of the passing moments.
